functions.name: process_architecture
functions.description: Get architecture and the list of system dependencies required for the project.

architecture.description: General description of the app architecture.

system_dependencies.description: List of system dependencies required to build and run the app.

name.description: Name of the system dependency, for example Node.js or Python.

test.description: Command line to test whether the dependency is available on the system.

required_locally.description: Whether this dependency must be installed locally (as opposed to connecting to cloud or other server)

package_dependencies.description: List of framework/language-specific packages used by the app.

name.description: Name of the package dependency, for example Express or React.

template.description: One of the available project templates.

response.architecture: The application will have a React front-end for dynamic user interfaces, with Node.js and Express serving as the backend for API requests, and MongoDB for the database. Authentication will be handled via session-based login, and the app will provide CRUD operations for todo items, along with access control and notifications.

system_dependencies.name: Node.js
system_dependencies.description: JavaScript runtime for building apps. This is required to be able to run the app you're building.

system_dependencies.name: MongoDB
system_dependencies.description: NoSQL database. If you don't want to install MongoDB locally, you can use a cloud version such as MongoDB Atlas.

package_dependencies.name: express-session
package_dependencies.description: Middleware for session management in Express

package_dependencies.name: react
package_dependencies.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

package_dependencies.name: react-dom
package_dependencies.description: React package for working with the DOM

package_dependencies.name: axios
package_dependencies.description: Promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js

package_dependencies.name: bootstrap
package_dependencies.description: Front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web

package_dependencies.name: dotenv
package_dependencies.description: Module to load environment variables from a .env file
